description: Episode number 2 of Series "War Experience". Uses actual newsreel footage to record the Australian soldier's participation in the Second World War. Covers fighting in Libya, Greece, Crete, Syria and Tripoli, and the Singapore, New Guinea and Borneo campaigns.
